title: Long wait times for a support ticket?
body: Has the wait times for any sort of response for a support ticket dramatically increased since i was last on the game? Usually i remember Riot support being fairly quick to respond and now its going past 24 hours with no response of any kind?

replies.body:
We've had a large volume of tickets submitted recently, so response times are a bit longer than normal. If you sit tight, we'll have a specialist with you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

I cant seem to long into my actual account, and i dont seem to receive any emails when i try to recover password or username. and i submitted a ticket about it but ive seen hide nor hair of any support about it?
